extendedInfo.description: ** IF YOU ENJOY THIS APP PLEASE CHECK OUT MY NEWLY RELEASED CONVERT EVERYTHING APP  **** A donate ad-free version of this app is also available **Random is a collection of utilities to display random data. Simply put, it's a random number generator but much more. It's very much a work in progress but below you'll find a list of what's currently available:- Integer Generator - generate numbers between a range of values (may include duplicates)- Sequence Generator - create a sequence of numbers in a range (no duplicates)- Integer Set Generator - generate sets of integers w/ customizable unique numbers- Raw Random Bytes - outputs in hexadecimal, decimal, binary- Decimals - generate random number of decimals- List Randomizer - randomize/shuffle a list- Passwords - support for both alphanumeric and special characters- Calendar Dates - generate a random date in a range- Clock Times - generate a random time in a range- Quotes - random quote- Colors - random color- Dice roller - roll dice based on user input values- Playing card shuffler - Geographic coordinates- Palettes - random color palette- Pattern - random pattern- Files - generate file(s) of a user inputted size filled with random contents- Random name generator - choose between male, female, or both.- Set patterns and palettes as wallpaper or share.- Audio - Play a random audio sound (hz) between inputted range @ specified length- Words - random word- Prime numbers - random prime numbers in range- Composite numbers - random composite numbers in range- Reminder - random reminder within time frame- Roman Numerals - random roman numerals in range- Even numbers - random in range- Odd numbers - random in range- Favorites- Usage statistics- On this day - random event that occurred "on this day"

reviews.title: All in one
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app.I use random wallpapers frequently but please include meanings with random words!
reviews.author: Hemant Kr

reviews.title: Random!
reviews.comment: \"Man who eats jellybean farts in technicolor.\" Best quote so far :D... only things that needs to be added is to copy text from the quotes. Also, visual feedback on the refresh button. And I receive overflows/crashes with big numbers.
reviews.author: Maarten Van Giel

reviews.title: Thumbs Up
reviews.comment: this is what all i wanted, thank u.
reviews.author: Kamal Gajera

reviews.title: Does exactly what is says
reviews.comment: Update: Thanks for fixing it! Always love a device who listens to their users! Great app.     For some reason, only the fields where there is already something written like a number my keyboard pops up. If there\'s a blank field, such as list randomizer, my keyboard doesn\'t pop up. Get this fixed, and it\'s a five star app
reviews.author: Colin Reddig

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Does what it says. However i found a small bug. If you go to lists and more, then goto palettes, then hit back (does not matter if you wait for the palette to load or not), and quickly tap near the bottom of the screen and slowly scroll up the app will crash. Galaxy note 2
reviews.author: Wyatt Grant

reviews.title: Time for something completely different
reviews.comment: Yup, this lives up to its name... each choice is random, and if you get the itch, this scratches it nicely. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Joe Myers

reviews.title: HTC Evo 4G LTE
reviews.comment: Audio force closes? Otherwise everything works.
reviews.author: A Matthew Truban

reviews.title: Another great app from Fluffy Delusions!
reviews.comment: A nice collection of little reference tools collected in one app. Very helpful for doing crossword puzzles, as well as when doing tech writing  or playing trivia games.  I wish I had had something like this back in \"the Dark Ages\"\342\200\240 when I played RPGs. I always had trouble naming  characters, kept losing my other-than-6-sided dices, & hated having to stop playing just so someone could go find an almanac or other reference book.  Kudos, brownie points & applause to the developer for another great set of tools!  \342\200\240 \"The Dark Ages\" - before personal computers, well before pdas & smartphones, back when one\'s access to a computer was punchcards or, if you were lucky,  TTY teletype.
reviews.author: Becky Mitchell

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this app for generating randomness! The features are great
reviews.author: William Beasley

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: But I don\'t like the gui when inside a tool.

reviews.title: Random
reviews.comment: Great! Took both the suggestions and added them :D thanks :) [previous review: Totally random :p almost all the things needed, but  1) save pictures /palettes things etc to SD 2) random name generator]

reviews.title: Responsive developer
reviews.comment: Very active dev, he is actively working on this!  Also great functionality, great for making decisions.  Love the quote feature, endless fun.

reviews.title: @Maarten
reviews.comment: Can you email what is crashing for you. Do you mean large amount of numbers to generate? I tried into the thousands to generate no problems. Well email me anyway so hopefully I can resolve the issue for you :)

reviews.comment: :) Nice app its fun and clean. +1000
